metadata.dc:author: Fuerte Ruiz, Sagrario
metadata.dc:description: Breast surgery training of residents varies greatly in Spain and depends on the specialty chosen and the centre where this is carried out. Training programmes have been changing and have been updated within the current trend for subspecialisation. The results from a survey show that, for residents, training in breast surgery is not very attractive as they think that they do not receive adequate training.
metadata.dc:title: La formación del residente en cirugía de la mama.
[The training of a resident in breast surgery].
